questions.question: Which of these sentences contain alliteration?

choices.answer: "These soldiers,  have volunteered in a time of  danger.
They are men and women  serving to protect our people.
Today, there's no ceremony to signal our troops' success.
They are the finest fighting force that the world has known.

questions.question: Which of these would you identify to be a fact?

choices.answer: The Earth is round.
Miss Newton is the best!
England are doing amazingly well in the Olympics.
GIS is the best international school in the world.

questions.question: Which of these would you identify as an opinion?

choices.answer: Donald Trump is 70 years old.
Donald Trump is an idiot.
Donald Trump is a member of the Republican party.
Donald Trump is worth approximately US$4.5 billion.

questions.question: Choose a sentence which contains repetition

choices.answer: The good, the bad and the ugly.
I have a dream. It is a dream rooted in the American dream.
Stop, look and listen.
I came, I saw, I conquered

questions.question: Which of these is NOT an example of a statistic?

choices.answer: The Newcastle United attendance on Saturday was 52,079.
This is equivalent to 1/3 of the population of Huddersfield.
Newcastle United's ground is called St James' Park.
Rafa Benitez has won 2/11 games at Newcastle.

questions.question: Can you spot the list of three?

choices.answer: The bullies are brutal, violent and vindictive.
We are afraid of being too smart or too stupid.
If we pull together we can fight this fear.
Have you ever felt afraid to walk around school by yourself?

questions.question: Which option is an example of ethos?

choices.answer: As a dentist, I see this problem a lot. I recommend this product.
If we don't adopt this puppy, he may never find a home!
Eating chocolate makes you happy, so you should eat it every day.
Peter Piper Picked a Peck of Pickled Peppers.

questions.question: Which option is an example of pathos?

choices.answer: He knows his dinosaur fossils, he is a paleontologist.
If we don't adopt this puppy, he may never find a home!
How could you not love vanilla?
If you don't study, you will fail.

questions.question: Which option is an example of logos?

choices.answer: The world's leading scientists think that carrots are healthy.
Homeless people have to suffer in the cold every day.
Eating chocolate makes you happy, so you should eat it every day.
